activities.name: Placing Wagers Using the Gemini Touch

cuepoints.caption: Let's talk about placing wagers for Draw Games and purchasing Scratch Off tickets using the Gemini Touch.
The terminal displays the messages to players here on the center of the Touch Screen.
To begin a purchase, players simply insert money into the Bill Acceptor
and the screen displays the amount of credits here.
In order to use the Gemini Touch, players must insert cash or already have credits in the machine.
The maximum amount a player can add to the terminal is $250.00.
The machine does not refund credits or issue any change.
To purchase Scratch Off tickets the player selects the preferred game on the touch screen
and the desired quantity of the game
and the ticket dispenses to the Ticket Retrieval Area.
For Draw Games, the player selects the desired Draw Game icon
and selects the icon for the desired number of plays and corresponding play amount,
and the tickets will be dispensed to the ticket retrieval area.
Remember, for ADA compliance, a player may choose to touch Flip Screen here
to swap the game buttons on the top and bottom of the screen.
If a player wants to purchase a Draw game ticket using a play slip,
all they need to do is insert the completed play slip into the Play Slip Reader.
Again, as long as the player has enough credits, the terminal will produce the ticket.
If a player attempts to purchase a Draw or Scratch Off game without the appropriate amount of credit,
the terminal will display a message prompting the player to add additional credits.
It's that easy to purchase tickets using the Gemini Touch!
Besides placing wagers, players can check both draw game and scratch-off tickets to see their winning status
by scanning a ticket using the Bar Code Scanner.
Ok, let's move on!
